moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Dirty Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the move’s target or targets are affected by a status condition.
